item.title: 英国将重新发放 3750 英镑补助金支持购买部分电动汽车
item.description: 英国工党政府正在重新推出高达 3,750 英镑（5,000 美元）的补助金，以支持电动汽车的购买，以支持其陷入困境的汽车行业，并实现净零排放目标。【原文：The UK is reintroducing grants of as much as £3,750 ($5,000) to support electric vehicle purchases, as the Labour government seeks to bolster its beleaguered auto industry and meet net zero goals.】

item.title: 英国央行建议将巴塞尔交易账簿规则推迟至 2028 年
item.description: 英国央行提议，作为提高英国贷款机构竞争力的一系列措施的一部分，允许投资银行在 2028 年初之前对其交易业务实施全球资本规则。【原文：The Bank of England has proposed giving investment banks until the start of 2028 to implement global capital rules on their trading businesses as part of a range of measures to boost British lenders’ competitiveness.】

item.title: 肯尼亚吹捧本国经济环境，希望外国投资翻番
item.description: 肯尼亚投资局计划在 2026 年召开一次会议，以强调东非国家良好的宏观经济环境，帮助促进外国直接投资。【原文：The Kenyan Investment Authority plans a conference in 2026 to highlight the East African nation’s favorable macroeconomic climate and help boost foreign direct investment.】

item.title: 中国投资者在当地低利率环境下的外汇储备达到 1 万亿美元
item.description: 中国企业和家庭上个月增加了外币存款，达到三年来的最高水平，因为他们押注国内利率将继续保持在低水平，从而回避人民币。【原文：Chinese corporates and households boosted their foreign-currency deposits last month to the highest in three years, as they shunned the yuan on bets domestic interest rates will remain low.】

item.title: S&P 五个月内第二次下调塞内加尔信用评级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司在五个月内第二次将塞内加尔的信用评级进一步下调至垃圾级，理由是这个西非国家的债务负担不断加重。【原文：S&P Global Ratings cut Senegal’s credit rating further into junk for a second time in five months, citing the West African nation’s rising debt burden.】

item.title: 特朗普对俄罗斯的威胁使石油买家印度和中国成为关注焦点
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统威胁要对俄罗斯实施经济制裁，这让莫斯科原油的两个最大买家--印度和中国--成了焦点，但市场目前仍对这种破坏持怀疑态度。【原文：President Donald Trump’s threat to impose financial penalties on Russia has put the spotlight on the two biggest buyers of Moscow’s crude — India and China — but markets remain skeptical of disruption, for now.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将上涨，英镑因关税担忧缓解而上涨
Pandox 财团出价 14 亿欧元收购达拉塔酒店
item.description: 包括 Pandox AB 和 Eiendomsspar AS 在内的一个财团已向 Dalata Hotel Group Plc 提出了 14 亿欧元（16 亿美元）的明确收购要约，Dalata 董事会打算一致推荐该收购要约。【原文：A consortium including Pandox AB and Eiendomsspar AS has made a firm €1.4 billion ($1.6 billion) offer for Dalata Hotel Group Plc, which the board of Dalata intends to recommend unanimously.】

item.title: 比特币回调，创纪录涨势引发获利回吐
item.description: 比特币破纪录的涨势使这一顶级数字代币突破了 120,000 美元的里程碑，交易者纷纷套现，导致比特币下跌。【原文：Bitcoin fell as traders cashed in after a record-breaking rally sent the top digital token above the $120,000 milestone.】

item.title: 比特币在旧制度瓦解时蓬勃发展
item.description:
加密货币周推动了寄希望于监管革命的反弹。【原文：

Crypto Week drives a rally pinned on hopes for a revolution in regulation. 

】

item.title: 新加坡私人住宅销售跌至六个月新低
item.description: 就在政府出台新措施抑制房价之前，新加坡 6 月份的新建私人住宅销售量降至 6 个月来的最低水平。【原文：Singapore’s new private home sales declined to the lowest level in six months in June, just before authorities introduced new measures to tame prices.】

item.title: 中国炼油产量回升至 2023 年以来最强劲水平
item.description: 中国 6 月份的原油提炼量是近两年来最多的，原因是工厂结束季节性检修，以抓住柴油等燃料的较好利润。【原文：China refined the most crude oil in nearly two years in June, as plants returned from seasonal maintenance to seize on better margins for fuels like diesel.】

item.title: 中东初创企业融资翻番，抵御经济增长普遍放缓
item.description: 今年上半年，中东地区初创企业的筹资额几乎翻了一番，一反经济不确定性和投资者谨慎态度导致新兴市场风险投资放缓的局面。【原文：Startups in the Middle East nearly doubled their fundraising in the first half of the year, defying a slowdown in venture capital investment in emerging markets brought on by economic uncertainty and investor caution.】

item.title: 马来西亚称尽管美国加征关税，贸易增长目标仍可实现
item.description: 马来西亚投资、贸易和工业部长扎弗鲁尔-阿齐兹（Zafrul Aziz）表示，马来西亚仍有望实现今年的贸易增长目标，尽管预计下半年的扩张步伐将有所放缓。【原文：Malaysia remains on track to reach its trade growth target for the year even as it expects the pace of expansion to moderate in the second half, according to Investment, Trade and Industry Minister Zafrul Aziz.】

item.title: 大选扰动市场，日本债券面临 "利兹-特鲁斯时刻 "风险
item.description: SMBC 日兴证券公司（SMBC Nikko Securities Inc.【原文：Japan’s bond market is facing a potential Liz Truss moment as the risk of a ruling coalition defeat in Sunday’s election fuels concerns over fiscal policy, according to SMBC Nikko Securities Inc.】

item.title: 埃尔多安对手受审，土耳其反对派遭炮轰
item.description:
埃克雷姆-伊马莫格鲁（Ekrem Imamoglu）预计将于周三出庭受审，他所在的希伯来人民大会党（CHP）谴责了所谓的对其市长和官员的不断扩大的镇压。【原文：

Ekrem Imamoglu is expected in court on Wednesday as his CHP party condemns what it calls a widening crackdown on its mayors and officials.

】

item.title: 电动汽车战略受阻，宝马将与投资者会面
item.description: 本周，宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）的高管们将在慕尼黑与投资者和分析师们坐在一起，可能会面临有关中国市场销售恶化和全球贸易紧张局势影响的棘手问题。【原文：BMW AG executives will likely face tough questions this week about worsening sales in China and the impact of global trade tensions when they sit down with investors and analysts in Munich.】

item.title: 法国政府的严格预算计划面临反弹风险
item.description: 法国总理弗朗索瓦-贝鲁（Francois Bayrou）将于周二提出一项大幅缩减法国财政赤字的计划，这将为一场有可能再次引发政府垮台的议会之争埋下伏笔。【原文：Prime Minister Francois Bayrou will outline a plan on Tuesday to sharply narrow France’s deficit, setting the stage for a parliamentary battle that risks triggering another government collapse.】

item.title: 中国锂业巨头上半年盈利预警后业绩下滑
item.description: 周二，中国两家最大的锂矿生产商警告称，电池金属的困境影响了今年上半年的盈利，随后中国锂矿生产商的股票大幅下跌。【原文：Shares in China’s lithium producers fell sharply on Tuesday after two of the largest miners warned that battery-metal woes had weighed on earnings for the first half of the year.】

item.title: 印尼考虑征收煤炭出口税以增加国库收入
item.description: 据当地媒体援引一位政府部长的话报道，世界最大的煤炭出口国印度尼西亚可能会对化石燃料征收出口税，以增加国家收入。【原文：Indonesia, the world’s biggest coal exporter, may impose an export levy on the fossil fuel in a bid to boost state revenues, according to local media reports that cited a government minister.】

item.title: GMO 重申 "一代难得 "的新兴市场债务呼声
item.description: GMO 继续对其千载难逢的新兴市场地方债务推荐充满信心，并表示美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府的贸易和经济政策使这一赌注更具吸引力。【原文：GMO continues to have confidence in its once-in-a-generation recommendation on emerging market local debt, saying the trade and economic policies of US President Donald Trump’s administration make the bet even more attractive.】

item.title: 中国钢厂引领建材产量大幅下降
item.description: 6 月份，中国在解决主要工业商品供过于求问题上取得了进一步进展，粗钢产量创下了 10 个月以来的最大降幅，领衔建筑材料产量降幅。【原文：China made further headway in June in its bid to tackle oversupply of key industrial commodities, with crude steel production leading declines in construction materials with its biggest drop in 10 months.】

item.title: 据说马来西亚 PNB 将考虑斥资 7.05 亿美元出售收费公路部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，马来西亚国有资产管理公司正在考虑出售其收费公路部门 Projek Lintasan Kota Holdings Sdn.【原文：Malaysia’s state-owned asset manager is considering selling its toll road unit Projek Lintasan Kota Holdings Sdn. in a deal that could be worth 3 billion ringgit ($705 million), people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 印度股市主要参与者关注简街可能的卷土重来
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: Energy Aspects称中国将增加石油进口以填补储备
item.description: Energy Aspects 认为，中国推动原油储备将有助于抵消商业需求的疲软，并使进口保持 "强劲"。【原文：China’s push to stockpile crude will help offset softer commercial demand and keep imports “robust,” according to Energy Aspects.】

item.title: 出口抵消消费下滑，中国经济增长 5.2
item.description: 中国第二季度经济增长超出预期，但对美国以外市场的强劲出口掩盖了国内消费需求疲软导致的压力加深。【原文：China’s economic growth exceeded expectations in the second quarter, but strong exports to markets outside the US masked deepening pressure caused by weak consumer demand at home.】

item.title: 新西兰央行称人口老龄化可能会长期影响中性官方现金利率
item.description: 根据储备银行的研究，随着时间的推移，新西兰人口老龄化可能会给官方现金利率的中性水平带来下行压力。【原文：New Zealand’s aging population is likely to put downward pressure on the neutral level of the Official Cash Rate over time, according to Reserve Bank research.】

item.title: 日本执政党面临失去上议院多数席位的风险
item.description: 日本执政党自民党及其联盟小伙伴公明党在本周日的选举中面临失去上议院多数席位的风险，这有可能进一步削弱首相石破茂及其少数派政府在与美国正在进行的贸易谈判中的地位。【原文：Japan’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party and its junior coalition partner Komeito are at risk of losing its majority in the upper house in elections this Sunday, potentially weakening Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba and his minority government’s standing further amid ongoing trade negotiations with the US.】

item.title: 英伟达将恢复向中国销售 H20 芯片，出人意料地逆转美国市场
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）计划恢复向中国销售其H20人工智能加速器，因为华盛顿方面保证将批准此类运输，这与特朗普政府此前的立场大相径庭。【原文：Nvidia Corp. plans to resume sales of its H20 artificial intelligence accelerator to China based on assurances from Washington that such shipments would be approved, a dramatic reversal from the Trump administration’s earlier stance.】

item.title: 报道称泰国将任命维泰为央行行长
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，泰国准备任命资深银行家维泰-拉塔纳功（Vitai Ratanakorn）为下一任央行行长，内阁会议可能会批准这一任命。【原文：Thailand is poised to name veteran banker Vitai Ratanakorn as the next governor of the central bank, local media reported ahead of a cabinet meeting likely to endorse the appointment.】
